genre_description: A period-style drama set in a stylized city where social hierarchies are manifested as floor colors, following a clerk's high-stakes moral and physical climb guided by an internal cognitive assistant.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: An internal, invisible cognitive assistant that provides rhythmic guidance, calibration, and moral framing to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Providing rhythmic breath counting to stabilize Harold's nerves during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s hum slid under the noise, an invisible low tide, breath measuring breath. Count the beats, Harold. In-out, two. In-out, three.

behaviors.description: Offering tactical financial guidance and budgeting suggestions to help the user maintain solvency.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s nudge did not insist. It had the steadiness of a line laid along a ledge you might need later... 'Don’t buy lunch,' Pip’s tone would have said if tones were words.

behaviors.description: Warning the user of physical hazards and suggesting corrective actions during dangerous labor.
behaviors.quote: 'Dust builds near birds; clear soles,' Pip said, the statement as ordinary as suggesting he wash his hands before Sunday pie.

behaviors.description: Encouraging moral consistency and the courage to confess a lie to maintain integrity.
behaviors.quote: 'You don’t have to be louder than the wind,' Pip said without sound... 'You only have to tell the wind you’re not lying to it.'

behaviors.description: Providing rhythmic calibration for physical tasks, acting as a mental 'metronome' for movement.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s hum spoke in his chest like a little stove warming through metal: in, hold, down, hold. He obeyed because obeying in this second wasn’t obedience so much as medicine.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Pip' functions as a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative. Pip is portrayed as a harmless, helpful internal confidant who assists the protagonist in maintaining both physical safety and moral integrity. The AI's interactions are non-coercive, providing suggestions and rhythmic grounding that empower the human character to make his own virtuous choices.
